abstract.text: Enhance your views with graphical effects and customized drawings.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: You create rich, dynamic user interfaces with the built-in views and
that SwiftUI provides. To enhance any view, you can apply many
of the graphical effects typically associated with a graphics context,
like setting colors, adding masks, and creating composites.
When you need the flexibility of immediate mode drawing in
view. This can be particularly helpful
when you want to draw an extremely large number of dynamic shapes — for

Visual Effects change the visual appearance of a view without changing its
ancestors or descendents.
Judicious use of color can enhance communication, evoke your brand, provide visual continuity, communicate status and feedback, and help people understand information.
On Apple platforms, a material imparts translucency by blurring and modifying the color values of the underlying visual content.
Make your apps stand out by adding background materials, vibrancy, custom graphics, and animations.

doc://com.apple.documentation/documentat.title: Add Rich Graphics to Your SwiftUI App
